name: places/ChIJ76wGFNv3wokRUr_LP0qJBLM
formattedAddress: 137 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 137 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026-2532, USA

originalText.text: I recently visited Body by Bombshell and had the moisture bomb facial. The spa is cozy, chic, and beautiful! I was warmly welcomed by my esthetician Jasmine who immediately offered me a mimosa while I waited. Once she was ready for me, Jasmine spoke discussed my skin care routine and walked me through the service. I loved that she not only made me feel comfortable and relaxed, but also educated me about my skin. The facial also came with a hand treatment and shoulder massage which I really enjoyed. By the end of my service, my skin was super hydrated and was thrilled with the results. It’s been a week and my skin is STILL glowing! I will definitely return for more services in the future.

originalText.text:
I recently experienced the wood therapy and body sculpting at Body By Bombshell (BBB) and I'm incredibly impressed with the results.
The procedure was skillfully executed by Britnee, she was super friendly, knowledgeable and attentive throughout the session. Not only did I notice immediate changes in my body contours (wish I took before/after photos), but the overall experience was relaxing and rejuvenating and I walked away with the BIGGEST smile on my face.
I’ve been telling all of my friends/family and I highly recommend this treatment for anyone looking to enhance their body shape and feel great. Thank you for the excellent service BBB I’ll definitely be returning!

originalText.text: This was my first time getting a facial, and Jasmine was exceptional! She made me feel comfortable. The place was clean and the way the space was designed was nice.. My skin feels hydrated and smooth. The service was really 5 star and I will definitely be back!

text.text: This was my first time getting a facial, and Jasmine was exceptional! She made me feel comfortable. The place was clean and the way the space was designed was nice.. My skin feels hydrated and smooth. The service was really 5 star and I will definitely be back!

originalText.text: The Moisture Bomb facial by Jasmine was absolutely incredible. My skin feels glorious, she walked me through every step so I was informed but also made sure I was super relaxed the entire time - the extractions were literally painless!  So stoked to have this spot in the neighborhood now, I will absolutely be back!

text.text: The Moisture Bomb facial by Jasmine was absolutely incredible. My skin feels glorious, she walked me through every step so I was informed but also made sure I was super relaxed the entire time - the extractions were literally painless!  So stoked to have this spot in the neighborhood now, I will absolutely be back!

originalText.text: I desperately needed a facial before a holiday party and I am so glad I made the decision to book an appointment with Jasmine. She took her time analyzing my skin and gave me an exfoliating and hydrating facial. I woke up the next day GLOWING. She is so thorough yet gentle with my skin and the results speak for themselves. I can't wait until my next facial.
